entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:03 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:03 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:03 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
